channel.title: Media on Systology
channel.description: Recent content in Media on Systology

item.title: Global CDN Media Serving
item.description: CDN-backed media delivery architecture for low-latency, highly-available global media serving with background upload processing.

item.title: Media Analysis
item.description: Best practices for media feature extraction: stable schemas, streaming vs. batch modes, metadata preservation, and performance engineering.

item.title: Photohaul
item.description: Java tool for organizing and migrating large photo collections with deduplication, metadata preservation, and resumable jobs.

item.title: Vidicant
item.description: Cross-platform video/image feature extractor (C++ core, Python bindings) for ML preprocessing focusing on throughput, accuracy, and packaging.

item.title: xcode-trial
item.description: Multimodal video analysis on macOS using AVFoundation, Vision, and Core Image â€” extracts faces, scenes, colors, motion, audio, and text with JSON output.
